sections.text:
71-6615.Hospice program; volunteers exempt.

Sections 71-6601 to 71-6612 shall not apply to any volunteers working on behalf of a hospice licensed under the Health Care Facility Licensure Act who, as part of their volunteer duties, provide home health care.

SourceLaws 1988, LB 1100, ยง 130;Laws 1991, LB 703, ยง 64;Laws 1996, LB 1155, ยง 66;Laws 2000, LB 819, ยง 137.

Cross ReferencesHealth Care Facility Licensure Act, see section 71-401.
